publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-246 Richard Lochhead: Committees Meeting in North East Scotland-That the Parliament supports the inclusion of the North East of Scotland in any study into potential locations for its committee meetings and options for permanently basing committees outwith Edinburgh.

S1M-246 Richard Lochhead: Committees Meeting in North East Scotland—That the Parliament supports the inclusion of the North East of Scotland in any study into potential locations for its committee meetings and options for permanently basing committees outwith Edinburgh.
S1M-246 Committees Meeting in North East Scotland (lodged on 2 November 1999) Alex Neil*, Shona Robison*, Brian Adam*
S1M-246 Committees Meeting in North East Scotland (lodged on 2 November 1999) Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Mike Rumbles*

S1M-246 Richard Lochhead: Committees Meeting in North East Scotland-That the Parliament supports the inclusion of the North East of Scotland in any study into potential locations for its committee meetings and options for permanently basing committees outwith Edinburgh. Supported by: Alex Neil, Shona Robison, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Mike Rumbles

S1M-246 Richard Lochhead: Committees Meeting in North East Scotland—That the Parliament supports the inclusion of the North East of Scotland in any study into potential locations for its committee meetings and options for permanently basing committees outwith Edinburgh. Supported by: Alex Neil, Shona Robison, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Mike Rumbles

S1M-246 Richard Lochhead: Committees Meeting in North East Scotland—That the Parliament supports the inclusion of the North East of Scotland in any study into potential locations for its committee meetings and options for permanently basing committees outwith Edinburgh. Supported by: Alex Neil, Shona Robison, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Mike Rumbles

S1M-246 Richard Lochhead: Committees Meeting in North East Scotland—That the Parliament supports the inclusion of the North East of Scotland in any study into potential locations for its committee meetings and options for permanently basing committees outwith Edinburgh. Supported by: Alex Neil, Shona Robison, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Mike Rumbles

S1M-246 Richard Lochhead: Committees Meeting in North East Scotland—That the Parliament supports the inclusion of the North East of Scotland in any study into potential locations for its committee meetings and options for permanently basing committees outwith Edinburgh. Supported by: Alex Neil, Shona Robison, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Mike Rumbles, Kate Maclean*

S1M-246 Richard Lochhead: Committees Meeting in North East Scotland—That the Parliament supports the inclusion of the North East of Scotland in any study into potential locations for its committee meetings and options for permanently basing committees outwith Edinburgh. Supported by: Alex Neil, Shona Robison, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Mike Rumbles, Kate Maclean

S1M-246 Richard Lochhead: Committees Meeting in North East Scotland—That the Parliament supports the inclusion of the North East of Scotland in any study into potential locations for its committee meetings and options for permanently basing committees outwith Edinburgh. Supported by: Alex Neil, Shona Robison, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Mike Rumbles, Kate Maclean
S1M-246 Committees Meeting in North East Scotland (lodged on 2 November 1999) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*

S1M-246 Richard Lochhead: Committees Meeting in North East Scotland—That the Parliament supports the inclusion of the North East of Scotland in any study into potential locations for its committee meetings and options for permanently basing committees outwith Edinburgh. Supported by: Alex Neil, Shona Robison, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Mike Rumbles, Kate Maclean, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson
